** As a  ** [user]
** I need ** [functionality]
** So that ** [benefit]

### Assumptions and Details
* [list any details or assumptions if applicable]

### Acceptance Criteria
``` Gherkin Syntax

 ** Given ** [some context]
** When ** [some event occurs]
** Then ** [some expected outcome]
```
